Description:
Urgently needs experienced Out Door Glass / Window Cleanersleaning windows and glass surfaces of residential and commercial buildings
Using glass-cleaning solutions, squeegee blades, cloths and water to remove grime
Operating lift equipment to access hard-to-reach windows
Washing and drying windows
Ordering and storing cleaning equipment and tools
Reporting any breakages that occur during the cleaning process
Cleaning gutters and downspouts to remove debris and prevent water damage to roofs
Applying window tinting solutions to reduce glare and heat transmission from windowsShould have experience in high-glass window cleaning using scaffoldings.UAE experience is preferable.Skills
